page.title: 07My Saturdays -Sian Humphreys
page.content: On most days in the week my sister is usually up first but sometimes I'm up first.On Saturdays I usually get up at about half past seven and go and have my breakfast.Then I go back to bed and read until about half past eight.After that I go out and play in the garden or cook something.At half past eleven I catch the bus and go to acrobatics class.That starts at 12.15 and finishes at 1.15. I catch the half past one bus home.When I get home I have my dinner and go and play with one of my friends. I play with them until about five o'clock.After that I watch T.V. until bedtime.
